sl {
    Version{"2.0"}
    collations {
      standard { 
        Version { "1.0" }
        Sequence { "
& C
 < č
   <<< Č
 < ć
   <<< Ć
& S
 < š
   <<< Š
& Z
 < ž
   <<< Ž
" }
      }
    }
}
